definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: He was nevertheless ordained as bishop of Avila amid growing controversy.
sentences.chinese: 不過，他作爲主教祝聖的阿維拉由於越來越多的爭議。

sentences.english: A story I like is that of St.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡的一個故事是阿維拉的聖特蕾莎的故事。

sentences.english: A story I like is that of St. Theresa of Avila.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡的一個故事是阿維拉的聖特蕾莎的故事。

sentences.english: Avila survived after two bullets were removed from his legs.
sentences.chinese: 阿維拉後存活了兩發子彈從他的雙腿刪除。

sentences.english: It was this cry for help that saved Avila's life.
sentences.chinese: 正是這種對呼救聲救了阿維拉的生活。
